verses.verse: And Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead <S%H2388><s%>, and strengthened himself against Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And he placed <S%H5414><s%> forces <S%H2428><s%> in all the fortified <S%H1219><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and set <S%H5414><s%> garrisons <S%H5333><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, which Asa <S%H609><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> had taken <S%H3920><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was with Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%>, because he walked <S%H1980><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, and sought <S%H1875><s%> not unto the Baalim <S%H1168><s%>,
but sought <S%H1875><s%> to the God <S%H430><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>, and walked <S%H1980><s%> in his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and not after the doings <S%H4639><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Therefore Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> established <S%H3559><s%> the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>; and all Judah <S%H3063><s%> brought <S%H5414><s%> to Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> tribute <S%H4503><s%>; and he had riches <S%H6239><s%> and honor <S%H3519><s%> in abundance <S%H7230><s%>.

And his heart <S%H3820><s%> was lifted up <S%H1361><s%> in the ways <S%H1870><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and furthermore he took away <S%H5493><s%> the high places <S%H1116><s%> and the Asherim <S%H842><s%> out of Judah <S%H3063><s%>.

Also in the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign <S%H4427><s%> he sent <S%H7971><s%> his princes <S%H8269><s%>, even Ben-hail <S%H1134><s%>, and Obadiah <S%H5662><s%>, and Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>, and Nethanel <S%H5417><s%>, and Micaiah <S%H4322><s%>, to teach <S%H3925><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>;

and with them the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, even Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, and Nethaniah <S%H5418><s%>, and Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%>, and Asahel <S%H6214><s%>, and Shemiramoth <S%H8070><s%>, and Jehonathan <S%H3083><s%>, and Adonijah <S%H138><s%>, and Tobijah <S%H2900><s%>, and Tob-adonijah <S%H2899><s%>, the Levites <S%H3881><s%>; and with them Elishama <S%H476><s%> and Jehoram <S%H3088><s%>, the priests <S%H3548><s%>.

And they taught <S%H3925><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%>, having the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with them <S%H5437><s%>; and they went about throughout all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and taught <S%H3925><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the fear <S%H6343><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> fell upon all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the lands <S%H776><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%>, so that they made no war <S%H3898><s%> against Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%>.

And some of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> presents <S%H4503><s%>, and silver <S%H3701><s%> for tribute <S%H4853><s%>; the Arabians <S%H6163><s%> also brought <S%H935><s%> him flocks <S%H6629><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>, and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> he-goats <S%H8495><s%>.

And Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> waxed <S%H1980><s%> great <S%H1432><s%> exceedingly <S%H4605><s%>; and he built <S%H1129><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%> castles <S%H1003><s%> and cities <S%H5892><s%> of store <S%H4543><s%>.

And he had many <S%H7227><s%> works <S%H4399><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>; and men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, mighty men <S%H582><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%>, in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And this was the numbering <S%H6486><s%> of them according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>: Of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, the captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%>: Adnah <S%H5734><s%> the captain <S%H8269><s%>, and with him mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>;
and next <S%H3027><s%> to him Jehohanan <S%H3076><s%> the captain <S%H8269><s%>, and with him two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fourscore <S%H8084><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>;

and next <S%H3027><s%> to him Amasiah <S%H6007><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zichri <S%H2147><s%>, who willingly offered <S%H5068><s%> himself unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and with him two hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%>.

And of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>: Eliada <S%H450><s%> a mighty man <S%H1368><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%>, and with him two hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> armed <S%H5401><s%> with bow <S%H7198><s%> and shield <S%H4043><s%>;
and next <S%H3027><s%> to him Jehozabad <S%H3075><s%> and with him a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fourscore <S%H8084><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> ready prepared <S%H2502><s%> for war <S%H6635><s%>.

These were they that waited <S%H8334><s%> on the king <S%H4428><s%>, besides those whom the king <S%H4428><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> in the fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> throughout all Judah <S%H3063><s%>.
